title: Hurtworld v0.3.2.3 x64
description:
My Gaming Community forum: http://forum.alkad.org/

Title: Hurtworld 
Genre: Simulation, sandbox, fps 
Developer: Bankroll Studios 
Year: 2015 
Platform: PC 
Version: 0.3.2.3
Language: Russian, Ukrainian, English 
Multiplayer: Yes 

System requirements: 
OS: Windows 7/8 / 8.1 x64 
Processor: 2.5 GHz 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Video: 512 MB, with support for DirectX 9.0 
Hard disk: 1 GB of free space 

Description: Hurtworld - is a multiplayer sandbox with elements of survival - hardcore crafting, construction, battles, exploration, as well as cars. Fight hunger, cold, heat and dangerous environment around you. Conquer your environment, build a base, explore your world. But the biggest danger is the other players. Create alliances and destroy your enemies. Hurtworld designed for the hardcore audience and aims to oppress. 

The game world - it's a huge desert, filled with dangerous creatures, animals and harsh conditions. Even if you are prepared and protected, random incidents can destroy all your plans. 

The main part of Hurtworld is PvP. However, killing other players will not be the main objective, but merely a further embodiment of the game play. Developers believe that the banal killing all the players will degrade the base - survival. So each player will be another main purpose. 

Each player will be able to build a house or a castle, using the resources of all shapes and sizes. Already in the alpha version Hurtworld system construction finalized and looks good. At the moment, developers want to create a whole library of building blocks and resources.

You need to have steam running.
Details:
this is a installer with a auto updating launcher thus meaning for future patch's you will not need to gather them from torrent sites as the launcher will update it for you :)

Instructions:
1. Run the installer then use shortcut provided on desktop
2. In the game main menu, press F1 and enter a server address
